name: Mismagius
author: Hideaki Hakozaki
flavor_text: Its cries sound like incantations to torment the foe. It appears where you least expect it.

poke_power.name: Magical Trans
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a {P} Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to another of your Pokémon. This power can’t be used if Mismagius is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Psychic Pulse
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
